                            double initPop,
                            double futurePop,
                            double rate)
        Calculate the year when the population reaches a certain number given the start and end years, percent increasem and and future population wanted.
        Parameters:
        initYear - the initial year
        initPop - the initial population
        futurePop - the population in a future year
        rate - the growth rate per year
        Returns:
        the year when the population reaches a certain number

      • calcChairs

        public static int calcChairs​(int rowNum1,
                             int count1,
                             int k,
                             int rowNum2)
        Calculates the number of chairs in another row in the theater given the row numbers, number of chairs increasing or decreasing per row, and the number of chairs in the first row given.
        Parameters:
        rowNum1 - the row number of the given row
        count1 - the number of chiars in row1
        k - the difference in charis per row
        rowNum2 - the row number for which chair count is being food
        Returns:
        the number of chairs in the wanted row

      • knowledgeGrowth

        public static double knowledgeGrowth​(double rate,
                                     double desired)
        Calculates the number of months when a student achieves certain percentage of the knowledge from studying certain material.
        Parameters:
        rate - the rate of knowledge gained in one month in decimal form
        desired - the amount of knowledge wanted in rate form
        Returns:
        the number of months to obtain the desired % of knowledge material

        Returns:
        the value of pi based on 'n' iterations of the series
